title: Kamaeru: A Frog Refuge (Epic Games) Giveaway
description: Foster a sanctuary for frogs! Score Kamaeru: A Frog Refuge for free on Epic Games Store! Kamaeru: A Frog Refuge is a 2D cozy frog-collecting game with over 500 frogs! Build and customize your own frog refuge. Don't miss it!
instructions:
1. Click the "Get Giveaway" button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Login into your Epic Games Store account.
3. Click the button to add the game to your library

title: Strange Horticulture (Epic Games) Giveaway
description:
Explore the lands Beyond! Score Strange Horticulture for free on Epic Games Store! Horticulture is a 2d point and click puzzle game in which you play as the proprietor of a local plant store.

*EDIT: Strange Horticulture  (Mobile version) is also available via Epic Games Store App for iPhone, iPad, and Android.
instructions:
1. Click the "Get Giveaway" button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Login into your Epic Games Store account.
3. Click the button to add the game to your library

*Visit the Epic Games Store App on Mobile to grab the Mobile version of this game.
platforms: PC, Android, iOS, Epic Games Store
